mapper.insert: insert into expense(moneybook_name, price, type, cartegory, insert_date) values(#{moneybook_name}, #{price}, #{type}, #{cartegory}, #{insert_date})
mapper.select: select price, type, cartegory, insert_date, eno from expense where insert_date like CONCAT('%',#{insert_date},'%') and moneybook_name = #{moneybook_name} order by insert_date desc, eno desc
